channel.title: Abouts on T3RRA.nl

item.title: Applications
item.description: There are projected to be 9 billion people on this planet in another 20 years. We want to help feed and clothe them all. We have innovative solutions, out-of-the-box thinking, and fantastic people. You’ll find that our software does things offered by no-one else. GPS guided terrain enhancement is now a reality. We provide industry leading software to make this happen: with greatest ease, and at least cost. Optimized land levelling, terraces, contour banks, drains, levees.
